data.name: Dark-WhatsApp by Vednoc
data.description: Complete, dark and light, very customizable userstyle for WhatsApp. In very active development on GitHub, check the page to get involved.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

data.name: Flight Rising: highlight Fiona familiars
data.description: highlights familiars used for Fiona's feats in pink :)

user.name: minecraft girlfriend
user.about:
hi im actually nonbinary but minecraft girlfriend sounded like a decent alias thats also totally unlike my regular usernames so im stealth and wont get banned for flight rising crimes
also yea i only created an account bc i needed to highlight fiona fams and went ahead and made a style for that! be the change u wanna see in the world

data.name: Youtube rounded elements
data.description: make elements of the site rounded

data.name: 💡 关灯，人人影视！
data.description: 【特色介绍】 　　custom.css 系列是适用于中文用户的轻量级美化样式表，可用于支持 Stylish / Stylus 扩展的浏览器。本样式表专为“YYeTs 人人影视”相关网站定制，采用深色视觉设计，统一页面风格，隐藏广告，特别为夜间浏览调校。为进一步提升视觉效果，建议搭配“全局思源黑体”或“全局微软雅黑”字体替换规则使用。 【重要说明】 　　1. 使用前请先下载相关字体。 　　2. 因无法及时查看本网站留言消息，问题反馈请邮件联系 francis@n2o.io，本人会第一时间回复和处理。 　　3. CSS 只能单纯隐藏广告元素，浏览器还是会在后台加载内容，如搭配广告过滤扩展 Adblock Plus 一起使用可彻底屏蔽，拥有最纯净的浏览体验。请通过浏览器的“应用商店”或“附加组件”等页面搜索并下载，安装成功后欢迎订阅本人编写的 QuarkList 过滤规则。

data.name: Fix Twitch Redesign 2020 (Dark Mode)
data.description:
This CSS will change the font and colors back to how it was before.

I've also decreased the font-sizes in some areas.

Want to contribute? Submit a Pull Request on GitHub: https://github.com/jaaneh/Twitch-Redesign-Fix

data.name: EliteTrader dark theme
Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1)  v.150
data.description: It's ONLY for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! ► The Goal: use at its maximum my WideScreen: - for the shots (Maximize the number of shots visible in the window) - for the Info (scroll list and hover) - for an admin happy life (adaptation for selected Greasemonkey scripts) - Less scrolling with a compact and useful styled interface. - Less "IN THE FACE" style (Smaller version of the shots in Photo Page and Justified Views). NEW (2020.04): To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE" at once, you can use my userscript [Greasyfork]: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE v.120 - TEST UserCSS style Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

data.name: e-flips dev helper
Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2) v.150
data.description: It's ONLY for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! ►► Additional Userstyles to my - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): for some userscripts (GM : Greasemonkey) i use since a long time and additionals styles for some not often used Flickr's pages NEW (2020.04): To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE TOTAL" at once, you can use my userscript [Greasyfork]: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE v.120 - TEST UserCSS style Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support
